description: This file defines a React functional component named ForecastList, which displays a list of forecast cards for upcoming days. It imports React and a ForecastCard component, checks for valid input data, and renders a section containing multiple ForecastCard components based on the 'daily' forecasts array.

methods.name: ForecastList({ daily })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of forecast cards based on 'daily' forecast data.
